filename: Private Transport for Tours & Trips Across Morocco 247.pdf
raw_text:
--- Page 1 ---
Private Transport for Tours & Trips Across Morocco 24/7
Meeting & pickup
We pick up all travelers
General areas
You pick up from all locations within 1 general area
Travelers cannot enter their own pickup location
Pickup starts: 15 minutes before departure
Additional pickup details
Pickup is available from anywhere in Casablanca‚Äîhotels, airport, train stations, or private
addresses.
We provide private transport from Casablanca to all destinations in Morocco, including
Marrakech, Rabat, Fes, Tangier, Meknes, Agadir, Chefchaouen, and more.
Just share your exact pickup point, and your private driver will meet you on time.
Our driver will contact you via WhatsApp or phone the day before the tour to confirm the
exact pickup time and location.
Categories & themes
Product types: Tour
Product itinerary types: Tour
Tour modes: 4WD, Car, Classic Car, Jeep, Luxury Car
Themes: Airport Transfer, Virtual tour or activity
Total Duration: 12 hours
What makes this tour unique?
What truly sets us apart is our fair pricing, our full reliability, and our strong respect for time.
We are available 24/7 to assist you, ensuring comfort, trust, and a seamless travel experience
wherever you go in Morocco.
We offer flexible pickup from any location in Casablanca and take you to the most popular
cities in Morocco at competitive rates:
Route One Way ---------- Round Trip.
Casablanca ‚Üí Rabat 800 MAD 1,600 MAD
Casablanca ‚Üí Marrakech 1,600 MAD 2,500 MAD
Casablanca ‚Üí Fes 2,500 MAD 4,500 MAD
Casablanca ‚Üí Chefchaouen 2,700 MAD 5,200 MAD
Casablanca ‚Üí Tangier 2,300 MAD 4,400 MAD
--- Page 2 ---
Casablanca ‚Üí Meknes 2,200 MAD 4,000 MAD
Casablanca ‚Üí Tetouan 2,500 MAD 4,900 MAD
Casablanca ‚Üí Merzouga (Sahara) 3,500 MAD 6,800 MAD
For any other city in Morocco, we can arrange the trip and agree on the price together once
you contact us. Your comfort and satisfaction are always our priority.
Inclusions & exclusions.
What's included
Hotel pickup and drop-off (within Casablanca city center)
Private air-conditioned vehicle
Professional and friendly driver (English or French speaking)
Bottled water during the tour
Parking fees and tolls
Door-to-door pickup and drop-off from Casablanca to any city in Morocco.
Full support during the trip to make your travel safe, smooth, and...
What's excluded
Personal expenses (shopping, etc.)
Guides and languages
In-person: English, French
Audio: None
Written: None
In-person guide is also the driver
Guides are official
Information travelers need from you
Edit
Reseller Status
Official reseller
Accessibility
--- Page 3 ---

(Including all transportation & surfaces)
Stroller accessible
Service animals allowed
Near public transportation
Infants must sit on laps
Infant seats available
Health restrictions
Not recommended for travelers with heart problems or other serious medical conditions

Most travelers can participate

title: Private Transport for Tours & Trips Across Morocco 24/7

raw_text:
--- Page 1 ---
Relaxing Hammam and Massage at Casablanca
Meeting & pickup
No, we meet all travelers at a meeting point
Travelers cannot enter their own pickup location
Meeting point
H2O Center - Spa & Hammam Casablanca, 31 Rue Abou El Hassan Es-S√©ghir, Casablanca
28810, Morocco
Meeting instructions
Please arrive at 31 Rue Abou El Hassan Es-S√©ghir, Casablanca 28810 at your scheduled time.
Show your Viator confirmation at reception, and the staff will guide you to the spa. Arrive 10
minutes early for a smooth check-in.
Activities details
Activity location
31 Rue Abou El Hassan Es-S√©ghir, Casablanca 28810, Morocco
Activity description
Step out of your daily routine and come recharge in an environment designed for relaxation
and well-being. Located in the heart of the Ghandi- district in Casablanca, H2O Center - Spa &
Hammam offers a variety of massages, luxurious private hammams, a hair and beauty salon
using top-quality products ‚Äî all provided by attentive and professional staff. All these
elements have been brought together to offer your body a special moment of relaxation,
helping you clear your mind and release all mental and muscular tension.
Step away from the busy city life and treat yourself to a deeply relaxing and rejuvenating
experience in one of Casablanca‚Äôs most elegant wellness spaces ‚Äî H2O Center - Spa &
Hammam .
Located in the vibrant Ghandi district, this hidden gem offers a luxurious private hammam, a
wide variety of professional massages, and a modern beauty and hair salon using only the
finest products.
Let yourself be pampered by our experienced and attentive team. Whether you're visiting
Casablanca for the first time or a returning traveler, this is your chance to experience
authentic Moroccan wellness with a modern touch.
Show less
Duration: 1 hour
--- Page 2 ---
This spa experience takes place at H2O Center ‚Äì Spa & Hammam Casablanca, located in the
heart of Casablanca, offering a blend of modern comfort and authentic Moroccan rituals.
Unlike standard spas, here you will enjoy a private, calm environment guided by professional
staff who speak English and provide personalized service.
The traditional Moroccan hammam and massage are performed using natural, locally sourced
products such as black soap and argan oil.
It‚Äôs not just a treatment ‚Äì it‚Äôs a cultural immersion into Moroccan wellness traditions. Perfect
for travelers looking to relax and discover local heritage at the same time.
Inclusions & exclusions
What's included
Reception assistance in English and will guide you and help with all
Traditional Moroccan Hammam treatment
Full-body relaxing massage
Private access to the spa facilities

Dinner and DJ Night on The James Rooftop An
Elevated Casablanca

Meeting instructions

your Viator booking confirmation.
The staff will guide you to the rooftop . Arrive 10‚Äì15 minutes early.
Categories & themes

Product itinerary types: Activity

Activities details
Activity location
161 Angle Bd Rachidi, Casablanca 20070, Morocco
Activity description
Upon arrival at JM Suites Hotel, simply check in at the hotel reception.
Show your Viator reservation (either printed or on your phone), and the
team will guide you to the elevator that takes you directly to T...Show all
--- Page 2 ---
Sample Menu
1. The Jame‚Äôs rooftop signature salad, A fresh and vibrant mix of seasonal greens, crunchy
vegetables, and our special house dressing ‚Äì light and flavorful to start your evening.
2. Pasta Bolognese, A hearty Italian classic prepared with rich meat sauce and perfectly
cooked pasta ‚Äì a warm and satisfying main dish.
3. The Jame‚Äôs Tiramisu, Our homemade signature tiramisu ‚Äì creamy, airy, and deliciously
sweet, offering the perfect end to your meal.
4. Dream Cocktail (Non-Alcoholic), A refreshing mocktail crafted with fresh strawberries,
basil, brown sugar, apple juice, and a splash of 7Up
Duration: 5 hours
Attraction: Casablanca
What makes this activity unique?
What sets this rooftop experience apart is its unique blend of gourmet food, vibrant
ambiance, and live entertainment in one of Casablanca‚Äôs most scenic locations. Guests enjoy
a 3-course dinner with a welcome non-alcoholic Dream Cocktail, while taking in panoramic
city views. A wide selection of alcoholic drinks and beers is also available. From Thursday to
Saturday, a professional DJ performs live, mixing Spanish, Western, and international music
to create an energetic and unforgettable vibe. On Sunday to Wednesday, enjoy a more relaxed
rooftop atmosphere with curated background music. With outstanding service, a friendly
team, and one of the best views in Casablanca, this is more than just dinner ‚Äî it‚Äôs an
experience.
Group type: Not private (shared)
Max travelers per product: 30

filename: ‚≠ê 8-Day Morocco Discovery Tour Casablanca ‚Ä¢ Rabat ‚Ä¢ Fes ‚Ä¢ Marrakech ‚Ä¢ Sahara Desert ‚Ä¢ Casablanca Airport. +2.pdf
raw_text:
--- Page 1 ---
* 8-Day Morocco Discovery Tour: Casablanca ‚Ä¢ Rabat ‚Ä¢ Fes ‚Ä¢ Marrakech ‚Ä¢ Sahara
Desert .
Overview.
Experience Morocco‚Äôs imperial cities and the majestic Sahara Desert on this unforgettable 8-day private
tour.Explore historic medinas, iconic mosques, ancient kasbahs, Atlas mountain passes, lush valleys, and the
golden dunes of Merzouga. Stay in beautiful hotels and traditional riads, enjoy Berber hospitality, and travel
comfortably with a private driver.
Highlights (Bullet Points):
‚úî
Private airport/hotel pick-up & drop-off.
‚úî
Explore Casablanca: Hassan II Mosque, Old Medina, Corniche.
‚úî
Discover Rabat: Kasbah des Oudayas, Medina, historic gates.
‚úî
Wander Fes‚Äô ancient streets, Chouara Tannery & Al Quaraouiyine.
‚úî
Stay in top-quality hotels & traditional riads (breakfast included).
‚úî
Visit Marrakech: Koutoubia Mosque, Ben Youssef Medersa, Bahia Palace & Souks.
‚úî
3-day Sahara Desert adventure: camel ride, luxury desert camp, Berber music.
‚úî
Scenic drives through Atlas Mountains, Valley of Roses & Todra Gorges.
‚úî
Private, air-conditioned land transport throughout.
Full Itinerary (Optional, Detailed Description on Viator):
‚òÖ
Day 1: Casablanca city tour (Hassan II Mosque, Medina, Corniche) ‚Äì Overnight 4 hotel
Day 2: Casablanca ‚Üí Rabat (Medina, Kasbah des Oudayas, Remparts) ‚Äì drive to Fes
Day 3: Fes city tour (Fes El Bali, Chouara Tannery, Al Quaraouiyine) ‚Äì Overnight hotel
Day 4: Fes ‚Üí Sahara Desert via Middle Atlas & Ziz Valley ‚Äì Sunset camel ride, overnight
luxury desert camp
Day 5: Merzouga ‚Üí Todra Gorges ‚Üí Dades Valley ‚Äì Overnight traditional hotel
Day 6: Dades ‚Üí Valley of Roses ‚Üí Ait Ben Haddou ‚Üí Marrakech via Tichka Pass ‚Äì
Overnight riad
Day 7: Marrakech city tour (Koutoubia, Ben Youssef Medersa, Bahia Palace, Souks) ‚Äì
Free evening at Jemaa El-Fnaa ‚Äì Overnight riad
Day 8: Marrakech ‚Üí Casablanca Airport ‚Äì End of tour
Day 1 ‚Äî Casablanca Arrival & City Tour.
‚úî Pick-up from airport or hotel.
‚úî Visit Hassan II Mosque (exterior & interior if tickets available).
Completed in 1993, it is one of the largest mosques in the world, built partly over the Atlantic Ocean.
Famous for its 210-meter minaret and stunning Moroccan-Andalusian architecture.
‚úî Explore the Old Medina of Casablanca.
--- Page 2 ---
Built in the 19th century, it is the oldest part of Casablanca, known for its narrow alleys and traditional Moroccan markets.
‚úî Walk along Casablanca Corniche (Ain Diab).
Developed mainly in the 20th century, this coastal promenade is a modern leisure hub along the Atlantic Ocean.
Known for its beaches, caf√©s, nightclubs, and luxury seaside resorts.
‚úî Overnight in a 4‚òÖ hotel in Casablanca (breakfast included).
Day 2 ‚Äî Casablanca ‚Üí Rabat (City Tour).
‚úî Transfer to the capital Rabat
‚úî Visit:
La M√©dina (Old Town).
Dating back to the 17th century (1600s), the Medina of Rabat was rebuilt during the Alaouite dynasty after destruction by
the Moriscos. It is known for its blue-white Andalusian style, traditional souks, and historic fortified gates.
Kasbah des Oudayas (blue & white fortress).
Built in the 12th century, this historic fortress overlooks the Bouregreg River and the Atlantic Ocean.
Famous for its blue-and-white houses, narrow streets, and beautiful Andalusian gardens.
Remparts & historic gates.
Constructed between the 12th and 17th centuries, Rabat‚Äôs city walls and gates protected the city from invasions.
Visitors can admire the fortified walls, monumental gates,
From Rabat, we will drive directly to Fes, and Day 3 of the program will officially begin in Fes.
Day 3 ‚Üí Fes (Imperial City Discovery)
‚úî
Scenic drive to Fes
‚úî
Visit inside Fes Medina:
FesEl Bali.
Founded in the 9th century (789 AD), it is the oldest walled part of Fes and a UNESCO World Heritage site.
Famous for its narrow streets, traditional souks, and historic landmarks, offering an authentic Moroccan experience.
Chouara Tannery .
Established in the 11th century, it is one of the oldest leather tanneries in the world.
Renowned for its colorful dye pits and traditional leather-making techniques still in use today.
Al Quaraouiyine Mosque & University (outside).
--- Page 3 ---
Founded in 859 AD, it is considered the world‚Äôs oldest continuously operating university.
Famous for its historic architecture and its role as a center of Islamic learning.
‚úî
Overnight in a beautiful hotel in Fes (breakfast included).
Day 4 ‚Äî Fes ‚Üí Sahara Desert (Start of 3-Day Tour)
Fes ‚ÜíIfrane ‚Üí Ziz Valley ‚Üí Erfoud ‚Üí Merzouga ‚Üí Desert Camp
‚úî
Pick-up from your hotel in Fes
‚úî
Drive through the Middle Atlas Mountains
Formed millions of years ago, the Middle Atlas stretch across central Morocco and are known for their cedar
forests and Berber villages.
Famous for scenic winding roads, fresh mountain air, and panoramic landscapes.
‚úî Enjoy panoramic views of Ziz Valley.
Dating back to ancient caravan routes, the Ziz Valley has long been a lifeline for travelers crossing the desert.
Famous for its dramatic palm oasis, deep canyons, and breathtaking contrast between green valleys and
desert mountains.
‚úî Arrive in Erfoud (Gateway to the Sahara)‚úî Continue to Merzouga.
Founded in the early 20th century, Erfoud is known as the ‚ÄúGateway to the Sahara‚Äù due to its strategic location
before the dunes.
Famous for its fossil workshops, desert landscapes, and as the last major town before entering Merzouga.
‚úî
Continue to Merzouga
A small desert village established near the Erg Chebbi dunes, one of Morocco‚Äôs highest sand dune fields.
Renowned for its golden dunes, camel trekking, and breathtaking Sahara sunsets.
‚úî Start your sunset camel trekking into the Erg Chebbi dunes.
Begin your camel ride across the golden sands as the sun sets, painting the dunes in magical colors.
This peaceful journey takes you deep into the Sahara, offering one of Morocco‚Äôs most iconic experiences.
‚úî
Enjoy sandboarding & Berber drumming under the stars
üèú
Overnight in a luxury Sahara desert camp (dinner & breakfast included)
Day 5 ‚Äî Merzouga ‚Üí Todra Gorges ‚Üí Dades Valley
‚úî
Sunrise over the Sahara
‚úî
4WD transfer back to the driver
‚úî
Drive to Todra Gorges
--- Page 4 ---
Massive cliffs reaching 300m
Perfect for walking along the river
‚úî Continue to Dades Valley
‚úî Explore the beautiful rock formations (‚ÄúMonkey Fingers‚Äù)
üè® Overnight in a traditional hotel in Dades (dinner & breakfast included)
Day6 ‚Äî Dades ‚Üí Valley of Roses ‚Üí Ait Ben Haddou ‚Üí Marrakech
‚úî Drive through the Valley of Roses‚úî Explore Ait Ben Haddou (UNESCO World Heritage Site).
Enjoy a scenic drive through fragrant rose fields and Berber villages before visiting the famous Ait Ben Haddou, a historic
earthen ksar and UNESCO World Heritage site featured in many international films.
‚úî Cross the High Atlas Mountains via Tichka Pass (2260 m).
Drive across one of Morocco‚Äôs highest and most scenic mountain passes, offering dramatic landscapes, winding roads, and
breathtaking views over the High Atlas peaks.
‚úî
Arrive in Marrakech .
üè® Overnight in a traditional Moroccan riad (breakfast included)
Day 7 ‚Äî Marrakech City Tour
‚úî Visit the main highlights of Marrakech:
‚úî Koutoubia Mosque.
Builtin the 12th century, it is Marrakech‚Äôs largest and most iconic mosque, famous for its 77-meter minaret and elegant
Almohad architecture. It serves as a landmark visible from across the city and a symbol of Marrakech‚Äôs rich Islamic
heritage.
‚úî Ben Youssef Medersa.
Founded in the 14th century and rebuilt in the 16th century, this former Islamic school is renowned for its stunning
Moroccan architecture, intricate zellige tiles, and peaceful courtyard. It was once one of the largest theological colleges in
North Africa.
‚úî Bahia Palace.
Built in the 19th century, this grand palace showcases exquisite Moroccan architecture, with beautiful gardens, ornate
courtyards, and intricate tilework, reflecting the wealth and artistry of the era.
‚úî Souk Semmarine & the Medina.
Explore Marrakech‚Äôs bustling market streets, full of vibrant shops, traditional crafts, spices, textiles, and the lively
atmosphere of the historic medina.
--- Page 5 ---
Free evening to enjoy Jemaa El-Fnaa square
Overnight in your riad in Marrakech (breakfast included)
Day 8 ‚Äî Marrakech ‚Üí Casablanca Airport
‚úî Private transfer from your riad in Marrakech to Casablanca Mohammed V Airport
‚úî Enjoy the beautiful changing landscapes along the drive.
End of the tour .
title: * 8-Day Morocco Discovery Tour: Casablanca ‚Ä¢ Rabat ‚Ä¢ Fes ‚Ä¢ Marrakech ‚Ä¢ Sahara
